data.eml:eml: A new species of Pharaxonotha Reitter (Coleoptera: Erotylidae) from central South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Skelley, Paul E., Segalla, Rosane (2019): A new species of Pharaxonotha Reitter (Coleoptera: Erotylidae) from central South America. Zootaxa 4590 (1): 184-190, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4590.1.9
